subtitle: 你们好！我是，呃，雷吉。还记得我吧？就是那个，多伦多的律师。你们肯定记得。抱歉一直没有联系！我猜你们正忙着拯救世界之类的事情吧。（尴尬地笑）
subtitle_en:
Hello! It's, uh, Reggie. You remember me, right? The, uh, attorney in Toronto? Yeah, you remember me.
Sorry I missed you! I guess you're busy SAVING THE WORLD or something.  (laughs nervously).
category: 行动任务/通讯/雷吉的语音邮件
